mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, imagePath, regdate FROM board_review ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_review (num, writer, title, imagePath, regdate) VALUES(board_review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{imagePath}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, imagePath, regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) AS nextNum FROM board_review ORDER BY num DESC) WHERE num = #{num}
